channel.title: TeX Live Utility Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.2 Initial beta release
item.description: • Added update checking via Sparkle • Rewrote authorized operations to use a kqueue and wait for tlmgr_cwrapper to finish executing • Exit status of tlmgr_cwrapper is now used • Added a warning when canceling an update/install operation • Use correct button check for reinstall warning
